original_text: Then some teachers of God's Law and some Pharisees said to Jesus, ‘Teacher, we want to see you do something powerful. This will show us that God has really sent you.’
korean_text: 그 때에 서기관과 바리새인 중 몇 사람이 말하되 선생님이여 우리에게 표적 보여주시기를 원하나이다

sentences.original_text: Then some teachers of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님의 율법 교사 몇 사람이

sentences.original_text: and some Pharisees said to Jesus
we want to see you do something powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신이 놀라운 일을 하는 것을 보고 싶습니다

sentences.original_text: that God has really sent you.'
